file_insights.description: Comprehensive TikTok Shop API integration documentation with setup instructions, API reference, and examples

patterns_discovered.details: Well-organized README following standard structure: Overview → Quick Start → API Reference → Advanced Features → Security Best Practices → Complete Example
Extensive inline code examples throughout documentation covering OAuth flow, API operations, error handling, and security patterns
Dedicated security section with best practices for credential storage, token encryption, HTTPS requirements, webhook validation, and token refresh logic
Documentation covers Shop API (products, orders, inventory), Content API (videos, posts), and Data API (analytics, metrics)
Clear documentation of exception types with usage examples for each: TikTokShopAuthError, TikTokShopRateLimitError, TikTokShopValidationError, etc.
OAuth flow broken down into clear sequential steps with code examples at each stage

gotchas_discovered.description: Refresh tokens are rotated by TikTok, so both access_token and refresh_token must be updated from refresh responses
Rate limiting is handled transparently by the client, which could mask actual API rate limit issues if developers don't understand the automatic throttling
Documentation recommends refreshing tokens 5 minutes before expiration to avoid race conditions with concurrent requests
Webhook signature validation requires both signature and timestamp headers, suggesting time-based HMAC validation
Multiple order statuses documented (UNPAID, AWAITING_SHIPMENT, etc.) indicating need to handle state machine properly

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully created comprehensive TikTok Shop integration README documentation
key_achievements: Created 721-line README with complete API integration guide
Covered OAuth 2.0 flow with step-by-step instructions
Documented all major API endpoints: Shop, Content, and Data APIs
Provided extensive code examples for common operations
Included advanced features: rate limiting, error handling, retry logic, webhook validation
Added security best practices section with practical guidance
Provided complete working example tying all concepts together
approach_outcome.completeness: High - documentation covers setup, basic usage, API reference, advanced features, and security

recommendations.rationale: Documentation references imports but doesn't specify dependencies or versions
Common issues like auth failures, network errors, and rate limits deserve dedicated troubleshooting guidance
Document available environment variables, their defaults, and validation rules clearly
Add examples for mocking API responses and testing integration code locally
Document breaking changes and migration paths if updating to new API versions
Guide for batch operations, pagination best practices, and optimization techniques
Clarify rate limits, daily quotas, and any tier-specific limitations
